Писал я когда-то, что считал игру отличной.

Считаю и сейчас отличной, отличной от всего того, что вышло ранее, и выйдет, ибо такое дерьмище выпустить надо постараться, ска, да им бы в Рокстар идти работать, те же тупицы, что годами добавляют лишь модельки/текстуры, но не видят не то чтобы бревен в глазу, а епучий лес размером с весь Лос-Сантос
Сплошное убожество: имея годный ПК и резвый интернет, многие подумают, что в эту игру можно играть без проблем, наслаждаясь новыми маньяками, НО НЕТ, получите 50-60 фпс на железе за 60-70к, выкидывание из лобби френдов постоянно, долгий поиск при 20к онлайна, итд.
Как в это играть? Какой страпон надо вставить в задницу, дабы после него это казалось манной небесной, может подскажет кто?

P.S. 2020

[h1]『奴らに明日は来ない。』(Dead by Daylight)
恐怖と興奮を楽しむ非対称対戦ゲーム[/h1]

※2016/8/28 内容を更新し、「おすすめします」に変更しました。

[h1]どんなゲーム？[/h1]
[list][*]5人で遊ぶ対戦ゲームです。1人が殺人鬼、4人が生存者チームです。
[*]殺人鬼は生存者を見つけ、殺せば勝ちです。
[*]生存者は発電機を一定数起動し、ゲートを開けて脱出すれば勝ちです。
[*]ポイントを集め、キャラを強化して勝利を目指しましょう。[/list]

[h1]良いところ[/h1]
[list][*]殺人鬼の冥い快感、生存者のひりつくような刺激
[*]どちらになるかで全く変わるゲーム性
[*]フレンドや生放送でのプレイにぴったり[/list]

[h1]悪いところ[/h1]
[list][*]やればやるほど「恐怖」や「興奮」が遠ざかるゲームシステム
[*]待ち時間が非常に長くなることがあるマッチング・ラグ
[*]なかなか落ち着かないゲームバランス[/list]

[h1]詳しい解説
良いところ[/h1]
[list][*]殺人鬼の冥い快感、生存者のひりつくような刺激[/list]

このゲームは対戦ゲームであると同時に、[b]ホラーゲーム[/b]です。
心臓の音が聞こえそうなほど近くで獲物を探す殺人鬼をやり過ごすとき、
文字通り[b]息が止まるほど緊張する[/b]でしょう。

岩陰に隠れた生存者のシャツがちらりと見えたとき、
[b]舌なめずりしたくなる[/b]のは私だけではないはずです。

しかも相手は退屈なAIではなく、意識ある人間です。
常に違う経験を楽しませてくれるでしょう。

[list][*]どちらになるかで全く変わるゲーム性[/list]

このゲームは殺人鬼と生存者でルールも操作法もシステムも全く異なります。
特に違うのは「視点」で、殺人鬼はFPS視点(CS:GOなどと同じ一人称)であり、
生存者はTPS視点(メタルギアソリッドなどと同じ三人称)です。

単独の殺人鬼と4人チームの生存者も戦略に大きな違いを生み、
[b]『1粒で2度おいしい』[/b]ゲームであるとも言えます。
特に殺人鬼はそれぞれが持つ能力が大きく異なるため、
それもまたゲームの多様性を大きくしています。

[list][*]フレンド同士や生放送でのプレイにぴったり[/list]

このゲームは開発段階から[b]フレンド同士や生放送向けに設計[/b]されており、
ホラーゲームという特性もあって大興奮間違いなしです。

発売直後はTwitchの視聴者数ランキングに入り続けるなど、
かなり早い段階から注目されてきました。
かつてのEvolveなどと違い、[b]低めの本体価格[/b]も高評価を得たと言えるでしょう。

[h1]悪いところ[/h1]
[list][*]やり込むほど「恐怖」や「興奮」が遠ざかるゲームシステム[/list]

ゲーム中の行動は「ブラッドポイント」(BP)によって評価されます。
これにより、「ランク」(競技性の目安、毎月リセット)と「レベル」(育成要素)を上げられます。

レベルを上げると様々なパーク(スキル)を覚えられるのですが、
パークのパワーバランスはかなり生存者有利に調整されています。
(鬼がこちらを見ていると分かる、鬼がトドメを刺すのに必要なフックを何回でも破壊できるなど)
そのため、生存者はある程度成長すると殺人鬼から逃れることが容易になり、
ゲーム開始当初の緊張感は薄れていくことでしょう。
(逆に頑張ってキャラを成長させれば、プレッシャーに弱い人でも多分なんとかなります)

[list][*]待ち時間が非常に長くなることがあるマッチング・ラグ[/list]

このゲームはマッチングに多少問題があるようで、
明らかにプレイヤーがいるにも拘らずゲームに入れないことが多々あります。
また無事開始できたとしても、このゲームはホスト(殺人鬼)にクライアント(生存者)が
接続するP2P方式を採用しているらしく、ホストの回線状況や地域によって
ゲームに支障があるほどのラグが発生することがあります。

開発チームもこの問題は認識しており対策を検討中のようですが、
待ち時間が長いのは明らかに大問題なので、早期解決を望むばかりです。

[list][*]なかなか落ち着かないゲームバランス[/list]

このゲームは、良いところでも述べた通り『2つのゲームが合体している』と
言っても申し分ないほど、陣営毎に別のゲームとなっています。
そのため、両陣営から『相手が強すぎる！修正しろ！』とのシュプレヒコールが
Steam掲示板や開発者のTwitterなどに押し寄せています。
(開発チームもこれをネタにしています)

もちろん開発チームはこれを軽率に受け入れず、
全体の勝率データなどから調整内容を決定しているようですが、
調整の度にゲームバランスが比較的大き目に揺れ動くため、
昨日までの定石が今日は通用しない、ということが有り得ます。

プレイ頻度がそれほど高くない人は、環境の変化も考慮する必要があります。

[h1]総評[/h1]
ゲームのルールやコンセプトは分かりやすく、
またリリース当初批判されていたシステム面での問題やゲームバランスも、
3歩進んで2歩下がるようなペースで少しずつ改善されています。

現在は両陣営ともにパークが揃っている場合が多く、
新しく始めた人は苦戦を強いられると思いますが、
しばらく遊んでいると段々と恐怖を楽しめるようになってくると思います。

殺人鬼は絶望を運び。生存者は希望を捨てず。[b]霧の世界へようこそ。[/b]

Haritaların, karakterlerin ve katillerin hep aynı olmasından dolayı sıkılacağınızı düşünerek oyunu almıyorsanız büyük bir hata yapıyorsunuz. Oyunun temel prensibi olan gerilimi "survivor" seçeneğinde fazlası ile buluyorsunuz. "Killer" birinci kişi olarak gösterilmesi ise katil ve avlama içgüdüsüne hitap ediyor. Bir arkadaş çevrenizin olması rank sistemi için bir artı sağlayabilir. Kesinlikle mükemmel bir gerilim oyunuu :))

It's an addictive little bug of a game, feels like early access.
You will get stuck in trees, fall trough the ground, be unable to pick or hang fallen enemies, get kicked from the game when you are about to win, and have enough material for a youtube channel.
So makes it really hard to recommend this game.
I mean it's alright but I doubt it will ever be in state of fully fledged bugless game.

It has gotten a bit better recently though.

This is a game that you hate and love at the same time. I'll start with why I love it.

The concept is great. 5 players total in game (1-killer and 4-survivors). Survivors either work together or alone to get the generators going so you can open the escape door and get away from the maniac. When survivor gets discovered by the killer, and a game of cat and mouse ensues. The survivor must jump through windows, lay down a barricade, or hide in a closet.
The killer's role is pretty straight forward. You must kill these people, so you may sacrifice them to a dark entity. Which is a giant hook that you hang them on so they can await their death. There's 5 killers that you can choose from. Each with their own unique characteristic. You have a Trapper that lays bear traps. ( Doesn't sound like a good killer but he's probably the toughest one to beat. There's a Wraith, who has the ability to turn invisible and not warn you when he's close. A hillbilly that weilds a huge hammer and a chainsaw that he revs up to give him speed. Then a new addition of a nurse, who can teleport through walls.


Now, here is why I give it a negative rating. The game was pushed out too fast. There are still so many bugs. Like disconnecting you while you are in the middle of something important. 
Trying to play a game with a friend? Should be as easy as, open room, invite friend, que. But You will have to repeat those steps a lot because it would kick you back to the main menu.
Another really bad thing. THe game goes off of a ranking system on your character. When you que up to play a game, you will not play against people of you're skill level. A brand new person could go up against the top ranked. Making for a horrible experience.

The game in all is great. You will have fun if you can get one going. But because of the bugs, I have to put it down. Hopefully they fix it soon. 

Give it a chance though. It's still a good game.

one word. amazing

Click ready simulator 2016
10/10 would play again.

First, the Game is amazing. It forces you to choose and f*cks you for choosing wrong, like trying to save a person just to get stuck in a trap and see the guy run away and leaving you behind to fill his place. SCREW THAT GUY, IF YOU ARE THAT GUY SCREW YOU. Besides that, the Action/Consequence... Mind? in this game is amazing. Few things need to change, quickly.
Like the perks, REMOVE THE TEACHABLE PERKS, At some point the characters becames just cosmedic, which is stupid cuz an athlete can "teach" someone to run fast for a couple seconds. After you get all the perks for all characters, you almost always choose the same 3 (self-care, saboteur, and Sprint burst (sometimes premonition or spinechill)) So whats the difference between Meg, Jake, Claudette, Nea and the last picked for the team at school guy. Like, you can play Dwight, DWIGHT, F*CKING DWIGHT and win. Just cuz you have all the perks and Dwight is actually Jake in a ret*rd costume. Get rid of that or a better Idea, BUFF THE OTHER PERKS. The box perk is amazing... for the first time you play the game, after that, you know where the boxes spawns and it becomes useless. Leave as it is at level one and at level 2 it increases your chances to get a better item, And at level 3, it the items comes with add-ons. Bunch of other perks need a change. Don`t nerf what`s working like Riot, Buff what is not.
The killer, After a few rounds it not scary anymore. Remove the red light from his face so people can be caught by surprise. They need to keep an eye on the killer, isn't that the reason that you have detection perks? So people can know that the killer is coming? Then what's the reason that they need the red light?
The survivors, If you don't change the perks, change the basic stats. Like the sprint speed, why can't meg run faster the claudette? she can run faster for a few seconds then she is back at the crawling, and why does Jake can't fix the generator faster the Dwight? Put jake to fix things faster, Meg to run faster (a bit faster then the nurse so that she needs to blink to catch up), Claudette to heal herself and other faster, and Dwight to be the most rounded character, Nea... she can be a more aggresive character, like wiggle out faster, more chance to escape hooks, stuns last longer etc but she is slower at everything OR GET THE ITEMS TO BE MORE EFFECTIVE AT SOME CHARACTERS. Toolboxes should be more effective for Jake not cuz someone can break a post with a hook at the end by his on hand that he knows how to use a screwdriver. Fix the flashlight, Let us blind the killer even if the turns around. It already lasts very little and its almost impossible to blind the killer even if he is looking right at it, we add the fact that he can turn around and negate that complitly. The map, I like it, But add a add-on so you can mark the hooks. And the skeleton key, one of the most useless items and it is super rare, if you go for the hatch as soon as it apears, you don't pip and lose the round, the add-ons consumes the charges so quickly and are almost useless exept the one that allows you to see the killer through the walls, That could be usefull if IT LASTED FOR 5 SECONDS and if it could see the wraith while invis. 
And for last, One thing that almost everyone is complaning, The killer, does not have to kill. THE KILLER, KILLER can be a pacifist and just scare people so they run from him. Fix that. And since you heard my suggestions. get hooks on the corner of the map so people don‘t run to the corner to keep the killer there since they can‘t escape him, people just breaks the hooks on one corner of the map and run to the corner. Get one hook in every corner and that either can‘t be destroyed or takes more time to do. And maybe respawn after some time or a after an event, like a generator getting done or the exits getting powered ot the hatch opening etc. The rest IS AMAZING, Good job with the game. Ah , the the ranks. get rewards for player with high ranks, like cheaper bloodwebs or free items for a some time, or even a new kind of money/points that can only be aquired by piping and with that point you buy items outside the bloodweb, so luck isn‘t involved.

tl;dr Fuck you, do you know how long I had to think to right the most clear review possible so dumb people don‘ get confused and think that I praise hitler for some reason. Do you really think that a text that size can be redused to a single sentence? Screw you and vai tomar no cu.

Sorry for bad english, Too lazy to look in the D*ck-cionary. HA I‘M SO FUNNY HAHAHAHA.

Muy buen juego para disfrutar con los amigos. Es de tipo sobrevivencia entre 4 personajes en donde todos deben arreglar unos generadores de energía eléctrica para poder huir de un sordido complejo...pero la dificultad y la cuota de entretención la pone el 5to jugador!! Se trata de un asesino en serie, una enfermera satánica o incluso una momia que tiene el poder de hacerse invisible... En sintesis...escapa y salva tu vida junto con tus amigos.  Pero el juego no se queda ahí...también puedes usar el personaje del asesino y jugar el rol de cazador. Cuidado con los grupos de players...pueden jugarte una mala pasada si te toca un equipo organizado!!!
El juego es bueno, su gráfica es muy aceptable y corre bastante bien en la mayoría de los pc. El único "pero" o "problemilla" es que encontrar una partida a veces se hace muy largo y eso aburre. 
El resto un 9 de 10. 
Felicitaciones a los devs!

Best Matchmaking Simulator out there! 10/10

Great game. Quite a few bugs and glitches. Finding a match as a survivor is difficult. But otherwise, fun as heck to play. 
For everyone complaining that such and such is OP, play both sides and you'll see. It's not as easy as you think to be on the other side. I think these people want a win handed to them on a silver platter to be honest. It's a game. Have fun and just play the game. To be honest, I think it's pretty even across the board as far as perks and abilities and skills are concerned. It's suppose to be hard, otherwise, what's the fun in playing?
I'd much prefer the designers work on more important things, like finding matches, than worrying about making people happy by nerfing a killer or survivor.
It's simple, find a gaming style that works on the killer/survivor you're up against. Use your mind.

I began disliking this game for many months due to the broken matchmaking with friends.

I admit it shouldn't have taken them so many months to fix this issue when people suggested so many solutions..


BUT they have fixed it and the game is a lot better than it was.

More like searching games til Daylight.... freaking love this game, played it when it came out for free on the weekend so I decided to buy it once the free period was over, had so much fun playing with my friends until the match making became unbearably long. Steam has me registered for 20 hours but in reality I have only been in game for 9, 11 of those hours I'm waiting with my friends to be placed into a game and most of the times it crashes and sends me to the main lobby, and after hours of waiting to get into a game half of the time lag is a main concern, however in those miraculous instances in which we get into a game and don't lag the game actually becomes very enjoyable and worth the 20 dollars, but until these server issues are not fixed this game is virtually unplayable with friends

Update: the game does not let me join any matches now, game is virtually unplayable, anyone who says that this has been fixed is obviously being paid by the game developers, wished there was a refund button

Update: after a year of crappy servers, this game has reached its potential, games dont take 2 hours to get in with friends and the game is fairly balanced now, survivors arent that OP and neither are killers, anyone that says the opposite is obviously trash at the game, obviously there are favorable killers and less favorable ones, but the thing about the less favorable ones is that if they get buffed one tricks become stupid OP, hence why the nurse has gotten many adjustments throught the game, every killer feels balanced in my opinion, after playing this game for many hours i think the game is worth the money, especially when playing with friends

I like the game and I like the premesis of the game, but I have to say I might wait to buy this game. I'm not sure if it will ever become less glitchy, but the following is what I have had problems with: 

1. Searching for a match when queued with friends, I constantly get "NO MATCHES FOUND", this is annoying because if it was actually searching it would continue to search for a game rather than give you an alert saying that there are no matches to be found, this also annoys me because when I play by myself, I never get this message

2. Occassionally when my friend quits out of Dead By Daylight, it doesn't allow him to start it again because it gives him an alert "The game is already running"

Without any hitches, this could be one of the best games I've ever played

Upvote if you agree, thanks.

In passato è stata un'idea originale, poi scopiazzata da diversi altri giochi, ma a lungo andare ha fatto il suo tempo. Attualmente il gioco ha molti più difetti che pregi e l'ho abbandonato. Credo che gli sviluppatori debbano invertire la rotta con una nuova trovata o abbassare il prezzo che attualmente è altino considerato che la maggiorparte dei DLC è a pagamento.

Pro:
- L'idea di un 4 vs 1 in questo modo è stata originale e bisogna dare atto di essere stati i primi e poi anche copiati da altri giochi.
- Necessario un gioco di squadra
- Tante abilità diverse 

Contro:
- Anni e anni di bug, ogni aggiornamento porta nuovi bug.
- Attese nella lobby infinite se giochi con amici, sono arrivato a toccare anche i 45 minuti in passato.
- Ha iniziato ad essere molto ripetitivo e a lungo andare noioso.
- Se, da survivor, trovi "compagni di team" menefreghisti e vieni accidentalmente catturato..... the end, quindi ci vuole pure fattore C su chi trovi nella tua partita.
- Se il mostro ti prende e ti facecampera.... the end parte 2.
- Certe cose sono troppo sbilanciate, ci sono cose inutile e cose dannatamente OP.
- Rispetto al passato, ora è molto complicato salire di livello per il survivor, questo cambiamento per me è stato assolutamente in peggio.
Updated review: Highly recommended now that lobby issues are largely a thing of the past.  Graphics could use updating, but the gameplay is thrilling and dynamic.

Купила игру по скидке и ни капельки не жалею! Я не любитель хорроров, но это игра стала исключением. Очень страшная, динамичная,захватывающая, интересная и атмосферная игра! Можно испытать много адреналина, когда убегаешь от маньяка или во время стелса :)
Очень надеюсь, что разработчики не забросят проект, будут добавлять чего-то нового, настроят нормальный баланс, уберут баги и читеров, и введут какую-нибудь штрафную систему ливерам (а то немножечко бомбит от таких тиммейтов).
Итог: Именно из-за своей оригинальности, не смотря на некоторые (не менее важные!) недочеты, игрушке ставлю определенно 10/10! :)
P.S. маньяки, которые не убивают тебя и дают немного прокачаться - спасибо вам! :))

Ach, Dead By Daylight du kleines Sorgenkind!

- Negativ -
Wie man leider häufig zu spüren bekommt dauert es meist länger ehe man ein Spiel gefunden hat und wenn dann noch Bugs, welche öfters vorkommen, auftreten, kann es ziemlich nervenberaubend sein. Wie man häufig hört soll es ums so länger dauern, wenn man mit Freunden spielen möchte. Allerdings kann ich dazu keine genauen Angaben machen, da ich selbst keine Freunde habe, die dieses Spiel spielen. Natürlich, wie bei fast jedem Online-Spiel, kommt es enorm auf die anderen Mitspieler an. Ist der Killer zum Beispiel ein Camper, fallen Rettungsaktionen weg, was sehr schade ist.  

+ Positiv +
Was mich überascht hat ist, dass es nicht langweilig wird. Auch nach stundenlangem Spielen ist doch jede Runde auf ihre Art individuell. Das Konzept sprach mich von Anfang an an und durch die Perks, Addons und Items kann man seinen Lieblingsüberlebenden bzw. Killer verbessern ohne gleich OP zu sein. Man hat also auch als Anfänger gegen jeden eine relativ faire Chance. Besonders wenn man mit den richtigen Leuten zusammen spielt, kann eine Runde zum großen Spaß werden und ein wahrer Nervenkitzel sein. Die täglichen, kleinen Aufgaben, für welche man extra Blutpunkte verdient(mit denen kann man zum Beispiel Perks freischalten), sind eine schöne und abwechslungsreiche Möglichkeit noch schneller an sein gewünschtes Level zu kommen. Und erfährt man erst, dass ein neuer Killer, eine neue Map oder ein neuer Überlebender in dem nächsten Patch dazukommt, ist die Freude ums so größer, da jeder Charakter sowie jede Map doch etwas einzigartiges an sich hat.

This game is like an abusive relationship. You wanna stop playing, but you find yourself still playing.

Suspenso, tension, horror...son algunas de estas sensaciones que tendras dentro de este juego de supervenvivencia cooperativa, deja salir tu superviviente interior, coopera con tu equipo para sobrevivir y escapar de lugar, se inteligente y rapido para evitar al asesino o escoge por ser el asesino poniendo trampas, escondiendote en las sombras, vigililalos y cazalos para escuchar lo gritos de dolor de tus victimas, tu decides.

Pros: un juego realmente novedoso, que te ayuda agilizar tu sentidos, cooperar con tus amigos y ser mas inteligente en cada partida, y cada una es diferente a la anterior, realmente recomendable.

Contras: A un le falta optimizacion al juego,a pesar de sus muchas fallas constantes como bugeos, el lageo y el sistema de rastreo de partidas, que a mi parecer muy desbalanceado, aun se puede difrutar el juego con una buena conexion de internet y una buena Pc.

Resultado: 7.9/10, aunque el juego aun no esta del todo "terminado", su ventaja es que es casi "nuevo", ya que de aqui a un largo tiempo, el juego se ira actulizando por parte de los desarrolladores gracias a las criticas y/o sugerencias de los jugadores para darle benficio al juego y vaya en una buena direccion.

Pick your poison. 

A: You enable cross-play, you get paired with 1-3 drooling, brain-dead console mouthbreathers and your game, day and mood are effectively ruined by the collective human degeneracy that is the cesspool of Cross-Platform.

B: You disable cross play, you wait for over an hour to get matched with someone barely competent. Doesn't matter if you have a full survivor lobby.

Игра 2ух режимная. Симулятор свинки и симулято ловли свинок. Посмотрите стримеров или видосики на ютубе если вам такой геймплей по духу то покупайте. Среди 10800 говенных игор в стиме это такой забагованный изумруд просто. Разработчики не заслужили были создать такую игру, так как опыт програмиздинга, разработки и прочего такой дерьмовый что создается ощущение что я и то больше во всем этом понимаю чем они. Напоминают инди-интузиастов с гаража чем серьезных разработчиков. Меню и все UI игры просто редкостное дерьмо. Даже поиск лобби не могут реализовать, хотя в этом нет ничего сложного. Если не говорить о криворуких разработчиках игра стоящая внимания.
